website_summaries.verdict: From having heaps of comfort and a true-to-width fit to requiring practically zero break-in time, this immensely handsome hiker is arguably as captivating as some of the greats from the brand. The shoe, however, is still hounded by a couple of misfires, the more concerning of which is the lackluster underfoot protection offered by its questionable sole. To sum up, despite its shortcomings, the Danner Camp Sherman is still a competent companion on the trail what with all its excellence in both function and form.
pros: Numerous users were impressed with the Camp Sherman’s precise fit widthwise
Almost everyone who tested this Danner hiker found its confines incredibly comfortable
Its super-short break-in period astonished a sizable group of wearers
This hiking footwear was rated highly by several reviewers in the design category
A couple of testers praised the shoe’s mind-blowing lightness
cons: Some owners criticized the Camp Sherman’s sole unit
They said that it was not sturdy enough to properly protect the foot against pointy rocks
The gear having no arch support at all deeply disappointed a consumer

customer_reviews.title: NOT "HIKING BOOTS"
customer_reviews.text: And not even hiking shoes. Soles are too thin especially around ball of foot area for that. Sort of OK for "casual" (not long walks on concrete even) but if I wanted casual, I could've bought far less expensive chinese junk than this chinese junk. Too late to return of course once used on a trail. Last Danner scammers I will ever buy. Edit: Not even OK for "casual." Maybe OK for bedroom slippers if they were slip-ons. I will try walking barefoot on the trail for a while and see if there is a difference. Plainly crap shoes from a junk-bond company.
customer_reviews.author: bleak

customer_reviews.title: Approach shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is an approach shoe...suitable for technical scrambling to approach a technical climb. It does not (and should not) have the same cushioning as a trail or running shoe. Seems suitable for edging. On par with some 5.10s I had years ago. Might even say I like the vibram sole over the 5.10 rubber? Gasp. I was trying them for tree climbing (arborist) as an alternative to trail shoes. I don't wear arbor boots. Not enough flex in the sole for limb walking. Pretty decent for adventure though. Personally do not like all the padding around the ankle. Pulls my socks down, and rubs achilles on my left foot. Only complaint, but super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Alysia Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Look Not as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for walking shoes that were casual/looked good. They don't really look as good in person. They are comfortable and would make a fine hiking shoe, but didn't meet the mark of doubling as a casual shoe too, so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: drewski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my guy... They aren't quite his style so he wasn't sure if he would keep them... Then he put them on and changed his mind. He says they are super comfortable... and he gets all sorts of compliments on them. They look really cool! He has worn them just around town, to work, and hiking... great for all occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these SHOES!!! They’re NOT hiking boots so don’t kid yourself. If you’re hiking in these you need your head examined. Buy hiking boots not these shoes. They’re a casual shoe that’s extremely comfortable and great looking. The soles don’t do well on ice. I like them so much I bought a pair in each color.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, very well made, great color (Gray/Green) and excellent fit (11 D US), sturdy, excellent quality. Good for light hiking but don’t mistake these for an approach shoe. After wearing them daily to work and on some desert hikes for a few weeks they are not as soft as I would have expected and aren’t as breathable as I would have liked. Still, these shoes are comfortable enough and I’m glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: siafu

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I tried on at least 10 different pair of top brand hiking shoes before purchasing these and not one was as comfortable right out of the box as thus pair. I bought them with the intention of wearing them for hiking only but I like them do much that I wear them every day. I've got at least 300 plus miles on them and don't show hardly any wear.
customer_reviews.author: paul wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made casual shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe. It’s a nice looking everyday shoe that I can wear to work. I’ve got a bit of a walk and these will do nicely. I wouldn’t say these are meant for trail hiking... more for everyday casual walks and knockin’ around town sort of thing. Comfortable and feel good on the foot.
customer_reviews.author: TRS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Awesome shoes as always
customer_reviews.text: Danners are the best. Don't settle for cheap crap. I got a wide size and they were just perfect, actually not too wide but a prefect fit and I'm 6-5 and wear a 12.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of the Sherman shoe by Danner. Danner makes a high quality shoe or boot. I have wide feet and these EE shoes fit my feet perfectly. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rick P.

customer_reviews.title: so good.. comfortable both on the trail and off
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good.. comfortable both on the trail and off. I work at an outdoor venue with a lot of uneven ground. I haven't had a problem yet with these shoes and they seem relatively durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding shoes from Danner
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding shoes. It was a pleasure to wear them right out of the box. I wear them to work in a govt. office setting and they are plenty nice looking enough for business casual. My work commute includes almost two miles of walking and they are perfect walking shoes. I am proud and pleased to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These hiking shoes are the best I've bought. They are easy to put on, lace up snugly, and great looking also. The construction is rugged and seem to be well built. Glad to have them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay VT

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for casual wear
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for casual wear, though they are a touch on the heavier side than most casual shoes. Great pair of shoes for days that you may be in need of both casual shoes and lite hikers.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Danner Camp Sherman Shoes from Outdoor Equipped
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes, very attractive and comfortable Quickly shipped by Outdoor Equipped
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. Time will tell but so far no complaints and I wear them all day at work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable so far hanging tough I recommend them
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box they were very comfortable But they put a sticker right on the arch in one of the shoes now my sock sticks to it
customer_reviews.author: drew jobin

customer_reviews.title: Tread doesn’t last, but shoes are super comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable enough to wear daily, but the tread is soft so even though they are durable to last and look good for more than a year, the tread wears down by then.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Picicci

customer_reviews.title: Danner does it again.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design, comfortable and true to size...Please keep making these because I will be wearing these out because you can dress them up or down...I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable as a casual wear shoe and for light hiking (have only used them for short day hikes).
customer_reviews.author: GMiller

customer_reviews.title: Danner is great quality!
customer_reviews.text: They're great! Wonderful Danner quality I was hoping for after owning their assaulter boots for years. Light weight, durable, and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best shoes I've bought in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Great color and style, a very comfortable shoe. I have wore these for the most part of the weekend, My feet have not felt tired after wearing like with so many other pairs I have bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: KMC30814

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Overall good shoe. Have worn them on most days for the last 2 weeks. Still breaking in but pretty comfortable. Fits slightly narrow on my heel, only reason for 4 instead of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit good look good my feet are picky
customer_reviews.text: Fit good hurt my feet I bought some inserts that are softer.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I will be purchasing another pair just to have on hand. Use these for everyday use and in the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Kollin E.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of danner footwear, and this pair does not disappoint. I have never had a bad word for their shoes.
customer_reviews.author: KAB

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size, greatly reinforced stitching, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size, greatly reinforced stitching, and lightweight. The first pear of Danner's boots I have owned and I am a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great low show
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These arrived quickly! I’ve been a big fan of Danners for years (32 years in the Army) and they have never let me down. These feel great and look well built and stylish. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JZulu

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but can get warm...
customer_reviews.text: We spent a long time looking for good shoes for my husband. He has size 14 flat feet with bunions. He loved these as soon as he tried them on. He helped with a wedding recently and was able to be on his feet for more hours than he has been able to tolerate in years. The only negative is that they are a bit hot. We are ordering another pair so that he can rotate them.
customer_reviews.author: CandR

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I needed a paiir of good casual shoes that could be worn in a casual work environment and outside of work for walking tours in Poland and Slovakia. I just returned and these worked great on cobblestones and wet environments. My feet felt great after wearing them for 14 plus hours per day over 7 days
customer_reviews.author: Big Kahuna

customer_reviews.title: Really sharp looking and very comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Really sharp looking and very comfortable right out of the box. Great cushioning for walking and dark color will go well with jeans or chinos. Highly recommended Usually order 9.5 - ordered 10 and they fit perfectly..
customer_reviews.author: piccolo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Standing for 8 to 9 hours a day is no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsee L.

product_meta.title: Danner Men's Camp Sherman 3" Hiking Boot
feature_bullets: Danner Plyolite EVA midsole offers lasting support and rebound
Vibram Approach outsole with multi-directional lugs for extra traction and surface contact
